Description: On I-81 at mile marker 7 in the County of Washington, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right lane, right shoulder, and exit ramp are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-77 at mile marker 1 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south exit ramp is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 144.2 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 243 in the County of York, near Busch Gardens, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
